name: Runaway Dice
description:
A Game made for the GMTK Gamejam for the Theme "Roll of the Dice".

You Run, Jump and Roll your way through obstacles to get your Dice Friend out of the Runaway Casino in this Endless Runner type game. 

Art/Design by Monika "Marzelina" Wrzeciono and Marie "Marienkaempfer" Secker

Sound-design by Maxi "Maximus" May

Development and Direction by Olivier "OlsieBoi" Claer
